definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: They will study at home on computers.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在家用电脑上课。

sentences.english: Home electric kitchen utensils made by our factory are easy to use and maintain.
sentences.chinese: 本厂的家用厨房电器，使用方便，维修简易。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理与家用的空气净化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: First, bleach should be referred to as full-strength household bleach.
sentences.chinese: 首先，应该浓缩的家用漂白粉。

sentences.english: Stabilized body care products, household products, textiles and fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 稳定的身体护理品，家用制品，纺织品和织物。

sentences.english: Energy-saving home gas stoves have been the national technology patents.
sentences.chinese: 家用节能燃气灶已获国家技术专利。

sentences.english: The advantages and applications of powder metallurgy materials in electrical appliances are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了家用电器中的粉末冶金材料的特点和应用慨况。

sentences.english: My family car is an SUB and I love it.
sentences.chinese: 我的家用车是一部休旅自行车，我爱死了。

sentences.english: The costs associated with a typical home pregnancy test have also dropped in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 典型家用早孕检测试纸的价格近几年也下降了。

sentences.english: The market of HCAC should be focused on high-grade individual housing.
sentences.chinese: 家用集中空调的产品定位应是高端的独立式住宅。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用电器，日用品，钟表电子产品手板制作。

sentences.english: LTD , SANHUAN HOME FABRICS is a towel factory in Gaoyang County, Hebei Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 是以出口为主的大型现代化家用纺织品生产企业。

sentences.english: Merchandizing is the trade name for businesses involved in the design and manufacture of clothing and household items.
sentences.chinese: 商品促销涉及到衣服及家用商品的设计和制造。

sentences.english: She put the book in the front room on top of the family Bible.
sentences.chinese: 她把那书放在前厅的家用圣经上。

sentences.english: Mainly for usa and euro market, items of garments and houseware.
sentences.chinese: 主要欧美市场，服装与家用产品。

sentences.english: Sit down with your kids and explain that you need to cut back.
sentences.chinese: 和你的孩子坐下来谈谈，解释说你需要削减家用。

definition: vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
to get around using a conveyance (car, bicycle, sedan chair etc)/to ride (or drive)/means of transportation
Nissan, Japanese car make/also transliterated 尼桑
to work with one's hands/manual work/workmanship
